label: Web UI
definition: Use via a web user interface.

label: API
scope_notes: Includes internal apps calling model APIs.

label: Email
definition: Use via email interface or email-based automation.

label: Public
definition: Data that is publicly available and intended for public disclosure.

label: Confidential
definition: Highly sensitive internal data requiring restricted access.

label: Personal Data
definition: Personal data as defined by applicable privacy laws.

label: Credentials
scope_notes: Must never be provided to external AI services unless explicitly allowed.

label: Customer Data
scope_notes: May include PII and contractual constraints.

label: Operational Logs
definition: Operational or system logs used for monitoring and troubleshooting.
scope_notes: May include personal data; classify carefully.

label: Security Telemetry
definition: Security telemetry such as alerts and detections.

label: Request Record
definition: Evidence that an AI use/service was requested and described.

label: Review/Approval Record
definition: Evidence that a review/approval was performed.

label: Exception Record
definition: Evidence that an exception was granted and tracked.

label: Renewal/Re-evaluation Record
definition: Evidence that renewal or re-evaluation occurred.

label: Change Log Entry
definition: Evidence of changes and their approvals.

label: Access Log
definition: Evidence of access control and access history.

label: Risk Assessment
definition: Documented risk assessment for the use/service.

label: Control Mapping
definition: Control mapping evidence to external frameworks.

label: Training/Guidance
definition: Evidence of training or guidance provided to users.

label: Monitoring Evidence
definition: Evidence of monitoring and ongoing oversight.

label: Incident Record
definition: Evidence of incident handling related to AI use.

label: Third-party Assessment
definition: Evidence of vendor or third-party assessment.

label: End-user Productivity
definition: AI used to improve productivity of internal end users (writing, search, summarization, meeting notes).

label: Customer-facing Features
definition: AI embedded in product/service features provided to customers.

label: Developer Tooling
definition: AI used to assist software development and engineering tasks.
scope_notes: Includes code generation and review tools.

label: IT Operations
definition: AI used for IT operations and system administration (monitoring, incident handling).
scope_notes: May overlap with security operations; classify by primary intent.

label: Security Operations
definition: AI used for security monitoring/response (SOC, detection, triage).
scope_notes: If primary goal is security posture, use FS-005.

label: Governance & Compliance
definition: AI used to support governance/compliance activities (policy, audit evidence).
scope_notes: Includes evidence generation and control mapping support.

label: Standalone
definition: Used standalone without integration into enterprise systems.

label: Enterprise App Embedded
definition: AI embedded into internal enterprise applications.
scope_notes: Often via API with internal controls.

label: RPA/Workflow
definition: AI invoked within workflow automation or RPA.
scope_notes: Requires traceability of triggers and outputs.

label: Managed Service
definition: Use via managed service with enterprise controls.
scope_notes: Includes centrally managed accounts and logging.

label: Shadow / Unmanaged
definition: Use outside of approved governance controls.

label: Data Leakage
scope_notes: Includes prompt injection and retention risks.

label: Security Abuse
definition: Risk that the system is abused for malicious purposes.
scope_notes: Includes malware generation and social engineering.

label: Compliance Breach
scope_notes: Includes export control and privacy laws.

label: IP Infringement
scope_notes: Includes training data provenance and output reuse.

label: Model Misuse
definition: Risk from inappropriate model use or over-reliance.

label: Bias/Fairness
definition: Risk of unfair or biased outcomes.

label: Safety
definition: Risk of harmful content or unsafe recommendations.

label: Third-party Risk
definition: Vendors, sub-processors, and model provider risks.

label: General Q&A
definition: General question answering and conversational use.
scope_notes: Low to medium risk depending on data type.

label: Translation
scope_notes: Beware of sensitive data in prompts.

label: Content Drafting
definition: Generating drafts for emails, documents, or reports.

label: Code Generation
scope_notes: Must scan for secrets and licensing.

label: Code Review
definition: Reviewing code for issues and improvements.

label: Data Analysis
definition: Analyzing structured data and producing insights.
scope_notes: Consider data classification and export restrictions.

label: Search/RAG
scope_notes: Risk depends on indexed data scope.

label: Agentic Automation
definition: Autonomous or semi-autonomous agents executing actions.
scope_notes: Highest need for controls and logging.

label: Policy/Control Mapping
definition: Mapping controls and evidence to frameworks.
scope_notes: Informative mapping only; not legal advice.

label: IT Helpdesk
scope_notes: May access internal credentials; handle carefully.

label: Control Testing
definition: Assisting control testing and evidence review.

label: Other
definition: Other use cases not covered above.
scope_notes: Use with free-text description and review.
